name: Rain Invasion
description:
Once, during a starfall, the sky was shrouded in black clouds and endless rain began ...
You play as a girl from the Vitu people. She, guided by curiosity, followed a shooting star, but stumbled upon a real threat to her world.



Rain Invasion - 2D platformer with puzzle elements.
The main character has only an umbrella, but you can modify it in order to pass the level.
